items.content_html: Ever tried to build your personal profile? Have been stuck in doing that? This is an open source portfolio management system for your personal brand. If you're a student or business or job seeker, you've landed to a great place. We build custom portfolio websites through automation as per you need it.

items.content_html: UE Auth is a multi-tenant OIDC Provider, User Management, B2B Product Access, and Roles/Permissions Management system intended to create a single hybrid solution to serve as Identity and Access for both self-registered B2C Apps and Enterprise B2B Solutions. The feature set combines similar functionality you find in Commercial SaaS providers for Identity Management at far less cost, and provides all of the missing pieces enterprises typically end up having to develop on their own in a single package available to your organization through an Apache 2.0 license.
items.title: UnitedEffects/ueauth: UE Auth is a multi-tenant OIDC Provider, User Management, B2B Product Access, and Roles/Permissions Management system intended to create a single hybrid solution to serve as Identity and Access for both self-registered B2C Apps and Enterprise B2B Solutions. The feature set combines similar functionality you find in Commercial SaaS providers for Identity Management at far less cost, and provides all of the missing pieces enterprises typically end up having to develop on their own in a single package available to your organization through an Apache 2.0 license.
